blurbs.ornament-gun/shoot-ornaments:
Ornament gun

A gun shoots ornaments and sticks them on a christmas tree. (COMPLETED)
blurbs.ornament-gun/ornaments-are-platforms:
Ornaments are platforms

The ornaments can be jumped on by players
blurbs.ornament-gun/obstacle-gun:
Guns can shoot obstacles

A variant of the ornament gun shoots spikes, walls, etc
blurbs.level-design/first-level:
First level

Players must get from the bottom of a christmas tree to the top
blurbs.level-design/adverserial-multiplayer:
Team deathmatch

One team climbs the tree, the other shoots the climbers
blurbs.level-design/floor-is-lava:
The Floor Is Lava

Players must scramble up the tree before being melted by rising lava
blurbs.level-design/golf:
Ornament Golf

Players try to jump up the tree with as few ornament platforms as possible
blurbs.obstacles/walls:
Breakable Wall obstacles

Walls prevent players from moving up the tree, but can be destroyed by shooting ornaments at them
blurbs.obstacles/checkpoints:
Save checkpoints

When players die, they go back to the most recent save checkpoint they touched
blurbs.progression/collectible-items:
Collectible items

Pick up items for points, displayed in a leaderboard
blurbs.progression/points-for-blocking:
Points for blocking

Players earn points for successfully blocking players' ascent up the christmas tree
blurbs.sfx/custom-music:
Custom music

Compose and perform our own music for the game
blurbs.advertising/basic-icon:
Game icon

Let players know what the game is about when browsing on ROBLOX
blurbs.art/define-art-style:
Consistent art style

Maps, models, sounds, ui elements, music, and advertising fit a cohesive artistic style/theme
blurbs.lobby/vote-next-round:
Vote next round

Players decide what game mode to play each round
